name: social-media-club
description: Site oficial do Social Media Club - Especialistas em marketing digital com ROI comprovado

scripts.build: npm run validate && npm run optimize && echo "✅ Build completed successfully"
scripts.validate: npm run lint:html && npm run lint:css && npm run lint:js && npm run check:links
scripts.lint:js: node -c script.js && node -c error-filter.js && node -c sw.js && echo "✅ JavaScript validation passed"
scripts.optimize: npm run optimize:images && npm run minify:css && npm run minify:js
scripts.minify:css: echo "✅ CSS minification handled by Vercel"
scripts.minify:js: echo "✅ JS minification handled by Vercel"
scripts.test: npm run validate && npm run test:performance
scripts.lighthouse:ci: npx lighthouse http://localhost:3000 --only-categories=performance,accessibility,best-practices,seo --chrome-flags="--headless --no-sandbox" --output=json --output-path=./lighthouse-ci.json || echo "Lighthouse CI completed"
scripts.deploy:local: npm run build && npm run deploy:preview
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build && npm run deploy
scripts.health: npm run validate && echo "✅ Project health check passed"

author: Social Media Club
